verses.verse: Now <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> John<WG2491> went up<WG305> together<WG1909> <WG846> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> temple<WG2411> at<WG1909> the<WG3588> hour<WG5610> of prayer,<WG4335> being the<WG3588> ninth<WG1766> hour.

And <WG2532> a certain<WG5100> man<WG435> lame<WG5560> from<WG1537> his<WG848> mother's<WG3384> womb<WG2836> was carried,<WG941> whom<WG3739> they laid<WG5087> daily<WG2596> <WG2250> at<WG4314> the<WG3588> gate<WG2374> of the<WG3588> temple<WG2411> which is called<WG3004> Beautiful,<WG5611> to ask<WG154> alms<WG1654> of<WG3844> them that entered<WG1531> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> temple;<WG2411>
Who <WG3739> seeing<WG1492> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> John<WG2491> about<WG3195> to go<WG1524> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> temple<WG2411> asked<WG2065> an<WG2983> alms.<WG1654>
And <WG1161> Peter,<WG4074> fastening his eyes<WG816> upon<WG1519> him<WG846> with<WG4862> John,<WG2491> said,<WG2036> Look<WG991> on<WG1519> us.<WG2248>
And <WG1161> he<WG3588> gave heed<WG1907> unto them,<WG846> expecting<WG4328> to receive<WG2983> something<WG5100> of<WG3844> them.<WG846>

Then <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> said,<WG2036> Silver<WG694> and<WG2532> gold<WG5553> have<WG5225> I<WG3427> none;<WG3756> but<WG1161> such<WG3739> as I have<WG2192> give<WG1325> I thee:<WG4671> In<WG1722> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> of Nazareth<WG3480> rise up<WG1453> and<WG2532> walk.<WG4043>

And <WG2532> he took<WG4084> him<WG846> by the<WG3588> right<WG1188> hand,<WG5495> and lifted him up:<WG1453> and<WG1161> immediately<WG3916> his<WG846> feet<WG939> and<WG2532> ankle bones<WG4974> received strength.<WG4732>

And <WG2532> he leaping up<WG1814> stood,<WG2476> and<WG2532> walked,<WG4043> and<WG2532> entered<WG1525> with<WG4862> them<WG846> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> walking,<WG4043> and<WG2532> leaping,<WG242> and<WG2532> praising<WG134> God.<WG2316>
And <WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> saw<WG1492> him<WG846> walking<WG4043> and<WG2532> praising<WG134> God: <WG2316>

And <WG5037> they knew<WG1921> that<WG3754> it was<WG2258> he<WG3778> which sat<WG2521> for<WG4314> alms<WG1654> at<WG1909> the<WG3588> Beautiful<WG5611> gate<WG4439> of the<WG3588> temple:<WG2411> and<WG2532> they were filled<WG4130> with wonder<WG2285> and<WG2532> amazement<WG1611> at<WG1909> that which had happened<WG4819> unto him.<WG846>

And <WG1161> as the<WG3588> lame man<WG5560> which was healed<WG2390> held<WG2902> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> John,<WG2491> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> ran together<WG4936> unto<WG4314> them<WG846> in<WG1909> the<WG3588> porch<WG4745> that is called<WG2564> Solomon's,<WG4672> greatly wondering.<WG1569>

And <WG1161> when Peter<WG4074> saw<WG1492> it, he answered<WG611> unto<WG4314> the<WG3588> people,<WG2992> Ye men<WG435> of Israel,<WG2475> why<WG5101> marvel<WG2296> ye<WG1909> at this?<WG5129> or<WG2228> why<WG5101> look ye so earnestly<WG816> on us,<WG2254> as though<WG5613> by our own<WG2398> power<WG1411> or<WG2228> holiness<WG2150> we had made<WG4160> this man<WG846> to walk?<WG4043>

The <WG3588> God<WG2316> of Abraham,<WG11> and<WG2532> of Isaac,<WG2464> and<WG2532> of Jacob,<WG2384> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of our<WG2257> fathers,<WG3962> hath glorified<WG1392> his<WG848> Son<WG3816> Jesus;<WG2424> whom<WG3739> ye<WG5210> delivered up,<WG3860> and<WG2532> denied<WG720> him<WG846> in the presence<WG2596> <WG4383> of Pilate,<WG4091> when he<WG1565> was determined<WG2919> to let him go.<WG630>
But <WG1161> ye<WG5210> denied<WG720> the<WG3588> Holy One<WG40> and<WG2532> the Just,<WG1342> and<WG2532> desired<WG154> a<WG435> murderer<WG5406> to be granted<WG5483> unto you;<WG5213>

And <WG1161> killed<WG615> the<WG3588> Prince<WG747> of life,<WG2222> whom<WG3739> God<WG2316> hath raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead;<WG3498> whereof<WG3739> we<WG2249> are<WG2070> witnesses.<WG3144>

And <WG2532> his<WG846> name<WG3686> through<WG1909> faith<WG4102> in his<WG846> name<WG3686> hath made this man strong,<WG4732> <WG5126> whom<WG3739> ye see<WG2334> and<WG2532> know:<WG1492> yea,<WG2532> the<WG3588> faith<WG4102> which<WG3588> is by<WG1223> him<WG846> hath given<WG1325> him<WG846> this<WG5026> perfect soundness<WG3647> in the presence<WG561> of you<WG5216> all.<WG3956>
And <WG2532> now,<WG3568> brethren,<WG80> I wot<WG1492> that<WG3754> through<WG2596> ignorance<WG52> ye did<WG4238> it, as<WG5618> did also<WG2532> your<WG5216> rulers.<WG758>

But <WG1161> those things,<WG3739> which God<WG2316> before had showed<WG4293> by<WG1223> the mouth<WG4750> of all<WG3956> his<WG846> prophets,<WG4396> that Christ<WG5547> should suffer,<WG3958> he hath so<WG3779> fulfilled.<WG4137>

Repent <WG3340> ye therefore,<WG3767> and<WG2532> be converted,<WG1994> that your<WG5216> sins<WG266> may be blotted out,<WG1813> when<WG3704> the times<WG2540> of refreshing<WG403> shall come<WG2064> <WG302> from<WG575> the presence<WG4383> of the<WG3588> Lord;<WG2962>
And <WG2532> he shall send<WG649> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> which before was preached<WG4296> unto you: <WG5213>

Whom <WG3739> the heaven<WG3772> must<WG1163> <WG3303> receive<WG1209> until<WG891> the times<WG5550> of restitution<WG605> of all things,<WG3956> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> hath spoken<WG2980> by<WG1223> the mouth<WG4750> of all<WG3956> his<WG848> holy<WG40> prophets<WG4396> since the world began.<WG575> <WG165>

For <WG1063> Moses<WG3475> truly<WG3303> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> the<WG3588> fathers,<WG3962> A prophet<WG4396> shall the Lord<WG2962> your<WG5216> God<WG2316> raise up<WG450> unto you<WG5213> of<WG1537> your<WG5216> brethren,<WG80> like unto<WG5613> me;<WG1691> him<WG846> shall ye hear<WG191> in<WG2596> all things<WG3956> whatsoever<WG3745> <WG302> he shall say<WG2980> unto<WG4314> you.<WG5209>

And <WG1161> it shall come to pass,<WG2071> that every<WG3956> soul,<WG5590> which<WG3748> will not<WG3361> hear<WG191> <WG302> that<WG1565> prophet,<WG4396> shall be destroyed<WG1842> from<WG1537> among the<WG3588> people.<WG2992>

Yea, <WG1161> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> prophets<WG4396> from<WG575> Samuel<WG4545> and<WG2532> those that follow after,<WG2517> as many as<WG3745> have spoken,<WG2980> have likewise<WG2532> foretold<WG4293> of these<WG5025> days.<WG2250>

Ye <WG5210> are<WG2075> the children<WG5207> of the<WG3588> prophets,<WG4396> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> covenant<WG1242> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> made<WG1303> with<WG4314> our<WG2257> fathers,<WG3962> saying<WG3004> unto<WG4314> Abraham,<WG11> And<WG2532> in thy<WG4675> seed<WG4690> shall all<WG3956> the<WG3588> kindreds<WG3965> of the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> be blessed.<WG1757>

Unto you<WG5213> first<WG4412> God,<WG2316> having raised up<WG450> his<WG848> Son<WG3816> Jesus,<WG2424> sent<WG649> him<WG846> to bless<WG2127> you,<WG5209> in turning away<WG654> every one<WG1538> of you from<WG575> his<WG5216> iniquities.<WG4189>
